name: Driver Crasher
description:
Driver Crasher - A prototype where you play as a vehicle driving straight for an infinite time, but its only infinite if you don't crash!

Avoid oncoming obstacles that are randomly generated in your way!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a prototype game. If you got any thoughts about it, please share them with me.  I value any type of feedback, and I will use it to help shape this game out. Have fun trying it out!
